user-favorite: Returns the most recent project favorited by the user.
project-thumbnail: Returns the image address for the given project's thumbnail.
user-pfp: Returns the profile picture for the user.
follower-count: Returns the follower count for the user.
user-project: Returns the project ID for the user's most recent project.
user-scratchteam: Returns whether or not a user is on the Scratch Team.
user-id: Returns the ID of a user.
user-joined: Returns the join date of a user.
project-views: Returns the view count of a project.
project-loves: Returns the love count of a project.
project-favorites: Returns the favorite count of a project.
project-remixes: Returns the remix count of a project.
studio-followers: Returns the follower count of a studio.
studio-hostid: Returns the user ID of a studio host.
studio-managers: Returns the manager count of a studio.
studio-comments: Returns the comment count of a studio.
project-title: Returns the title of a project.
project-remix: Checks if a project is a remix.
project-modified: Checks when a project was last modified.
project-shared: Checks when a project was last shared.
project-created: Checks when a project was created.
